meanings.sent1: The topologic study of shapes helps us understand their properties.
meanings.sent2: The topologic analysis of the map showed the connections between different regions.
meanings.sent3: The topologic puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her topologic approach to problem-solving was both creative and effective.
meanings.sent5: The topologic nature of the terrain made navigation difficult.

meanings.definition: Involving the properties of a geometric figure that are unaffected by continuous distortion.
meanings.sent1: The topologic characteristics of the rubber band allowed it to stretch without losing its shape.
meanings.sent2: The topologic stability of the structure ensured it could withstand various external forces.
meanings.sent3: The topologic flexibility of the material surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The topologic resilience of the fabric made it ideal for outdoor use.
meanings.sent5: The topologic integrity of the design remained intact despite rough handling.
